ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claws
ygData.msgSnippet: I was kinda curious about that too.... so many people had told me about the Demon Claw , when I finally got one, it was called something different. At first,
ygData.messageBody:
I was kinda curious about that too.... so many people had told me about the
"Demon Claw", when I finally got one, it was called something different. At
first, I thought maybe it wasn't the same thing. I checked the stats, tho,
and it has the same stats as the "Demon Claw" I have seen so many speak of.

Perhaps it is an effort in Verant's part to remove "Demon", "Devil", or any
other type of "no-no" word from their game. Or perhaps it is just an attempt
to give a neat weapon a neater name (Smile).

My only wish was that we could use TWO of these, run around like wanna-be
Wolverine super-heroes. HEHehehehe!

Tallonn - Bertox


-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>

Subject: [eqbards] Demon Claws


>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>Anyone look at their demon claws lately?
>
>i haven't used mine in a few levels, and i happened to right-click on mine
>this morning at the bank, and they are now called Bloody Thulian Claws or
>something (maybe not claws, but definitely Blood Thulian thingies). dunno
>if this is old news, but i just noticed it.
>
>Shada Silverleaf, Level 49 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
